data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_2e15a0a506aaecd9b3de40a8cc9f7ec7.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Uranus absorbs the energy generated by incoming attacks to strengthen himself, regenerating a certain amount of HP every 0.8s. Each stack lasts 10s. When at max stacks (20), Uranus regenerates 48-224 HP (scales with level).

Uranus releases two energy blades that orbit around him, dealing 155<font color="62f8fe"> (+30% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemy targets and slowing them by 30% for 2s. 

Each time this skill deals damage to a target, they will be marked with a stack for 6s (max of 1 stack per target per cast). Each stack increases the damage of this skill by 40% (to a max of 320%). Each energy blade will only deal damage to the same target once.

Uranus charges to the target location, dealing 80<font color="62f8fe"> (+20% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies along the way, and 160<font color="62f8fe"> (+80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies at the target location and slowing them by 25%. Uranus also generates a 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+200% Total Magic Power)</font> shield for 4s.

The shield explodes at the end of its duration or when destroyed, dealing 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies nearby.

Uranus unleashes the energy stored within his body, removing slow effects on himself, recovering 200 HP, and gaining 60% Movement Speed for 8s (decays over time).

Uranus directly gains 5 stacks of Radiance, increasing shields received and HP Regen by 20% for 8s.

data.name: Uranus

__data.skilldesc: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num2> extra Movement Speed and [C2Slow Immunity] for <Num1>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: Can tank and deal damage. Balanced offense & defense.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+500 Extra Max HP
+10 Extra Physical Defense
+10 Extra Magic Defense
+4 HP Regen

emblemskill.skilldesc: When HP is below 50%, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by 15.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: When HP is below <%Num1>, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by <Num2>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: When HP is below 50%, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by 15.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After the next Basic Attack, deal 100(+0.07 Total HP) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: After the next Basic Attack, deal <Num1> Magic Damage to nearby enemies.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num2>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
After the next Basic Attack, deal 100(+7% Total HP) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+50 Magic Power
+250 Extra Max HP
+20% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+850 Extra Max HP
+20 Extra Physical Defense
+20 Extra Magic Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+600 Extra Max HP
+23 Extra Physical Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Holy Blessing: Taking Magic Damage grants 5(+1*Hero Level) Magic Defense for 5s, up to 6 stacks (can only gain 1 stack(s) every 0.6s).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Holy Blessing: Taking Magic Damage grants 5(+1*Hero Level) Magic Defense for 5s, up to 6 stacks (can only gain 1 stack(s) every 0.6s).
equiplist.equiptips:
+950 Extra Max HP
+40 Extra Magic Defense
+12 HP Regen

recommendmasterplan.name: Fire Flux Esports Alien
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Guardian made from lightning and air, guards the Celestial Palace.

assist.desc: Uranus becomes much more powerful when working with high-damage heroes like Beatrix and Hanabi.

strong.desc: Uranus has great sustainability, making him strong against heroes with low-damage abilities, such as Tigreal and Franco.

weak.desc: Uranus lacks Mobility and CC abilities which makes him an easy target for ranged heroes, such as Layla and Lesley.
